name: ChiroVerti Elite Table
descr:
New drop table. 4 manual drops. Flotaing thoracic section drops away for pregnant woman or clients with larger mid section. Tension control for each drop section. Adjustable height and tilting headpiece with adjustable cushions. Mororized extension and adjustable length ankle rest, to easily accommodate every patient. An extremely rigid heavy duty column actuator.

Accessories: extra foot switch.
